snippet: Saying it would “oppose pressure and confrontation” on the United Nations Human Rights Council and advance the cause of human rights, China was elected to it for a three-year term along with Cuba, Saudi Arabia and Russia.
abstract: Saying it would “oppose pressure and confrontation” on the United Nations Human Rights Council and advance the cause of human rights, China was elected to it for a three-year term along with Cuba, Saudi Arabia and Russia.

headline.main: China Elected to United Nations Human Rights Council

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
